topic.title: developerWorks articles
topic.shortdesc: This document contains articles about DITA that were originally published on developerWorks. The online articles have been updated more recently than the versions in this document.

link.linktext: Introduction to the Darwin Information Typing Architecture
link.desc: developerWorks article by Don Day, Michael Priestley, and Dave Schell. Originally posted 01 March 2001; updated 28 September 2006.
developerWorks article by Michael Priestley. Originally published 01 March 2001; updated 28 September 2005.
developerWorks article by Erik Hennum. Originally published 01 May 2002; updated 28 September 2005.
